title: OFF DUTY  ---  Gear & Gadgets:  Keep Your Voice -2-
text:
August 2013: WhatsApp launches its own voice message function, cited as a "walkie-talkie" style feature.

June 2014: Apple includes self-destructing voice message functionality in iMessage with iOS 8.

December 2018: Instagram adds voice messages as a new way to slide into someone's DMs.

October 2021: Hinge also adds voice messages, as well as a "voice prompt" function that lets people add recordings to their profiles.

August 2022: Britney Spears uploads a 22-minute voice message detailing her conservatorship on YouTube.

September 2022: Apple's iOS 16 makes voice messages easier to record hands-free. It remains difficult to scrub through a message you've received.
